items.text: on the pads, worked through midwicket for a run
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: full delivery outside off, driven to cover
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: runs down to the pitch, gets there and drives to cover
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: flight on off and middle, Tharanga gets underneath the length and nails a lofted drive over long-off. Very simple swing, nicely played
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, SIX runs

items.text: slow around middle, a thick outside edge past slip for a couple
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, 2 runs

items.text: dropped by Tamim at cover, but that's a good effort. Some more flight outside off, Tharanga dances down and lifts the ball towards deep cover. Tamim dives to his left and can only get a bit of hand on it.
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: nudged into the leg side, towards midwicket
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: slashy thrashy shot, full and wide outside off, a thick outside edge down to third man
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: a slower delivery and wide outside off, chopped away to cover
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: another beautiful languid swing through mid-off for six more. An offcutter, Gunathilaka comes down and lofts the ball cleanly. Too easy
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Gunathilaka, SIX runs

items.text: good length around off, worked to midwicket
items.postText: Prem: "It looks like Danushka G has secured his place for the finals!"
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: a short delivery down leg, hustles Gunathilaka on his pull, heaved away down to fine leg
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: an interesting slower ball, on middle and leg, Gunathilaka misses a flick, struck on the pad. It rolls by, he picks it up and gives the ball back. No appeal. If they did, he probably would have been out.
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: flat and straight, the slider, defended into the cover region
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: 86 kph, flat and quick on off, another defensive block
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: 85 kph, comes down and drives towards long-off. Got close to the ball with a shimmy down
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: nicely bowled, 85 kph, slowed up nicely, around off, Watchfully defended
items.postText: Udara Ranasingh: "Savage indictment of a reality check for both teams. One is not as bad as they thought they were.. one is not as good.."
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: comes down, looking to work the ball into the leg side, a leading edge to cover
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: shortish around off, defended into the off side
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: back of a length and outside off, Tharanga throws his bat at the ball and watches it skirt past his cut
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.preText: Binusha: "Getting the happy feeling which was missing for a long time as a SL fan. Feel like good old days."
items.text: back of a length and outside off, Tharanga goes for a big pull but only under-edges it to the right of a diving keeper
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full on middle, tip and run to the covers
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: rides the bounce of this shortish ball outside off and slides it to third man
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Gunathilaka, 1 run

items.text: pitched up on of stump, squeezed to cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full on off stump, Tharanga gets underneath the length and merrily launches a six over the long-on boundary. Lovely, clean strike
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, SIX runs
